Specific Steps:

1. edit a java configuration (to make it dirty)
2. do not press apply and press the run button

Expected:
the program runs

Happens:
the following error is logged and the program runs

fixed in HEAD

the problem was that the async notification of configs added/removed was happening once the dialog had been closed. Fix is to check if the tree is disposed before trying to update from either of the async jobs. 

another victim of bug 198428...
Verified. Need to update our fix in 3.3.2 to include this.
